headline: February 18: Prince Andrew Faces New Scrutiny as Epstein Files Reveal Sensitive Information Sharing

This is a summary of today's Epstein Files Daily roundup. Read the full article with all sources →

Today's Key Developments

  • Prince Andrew — UK police assess allegations he shared sensitive trade reports with Epstein, amid new email revelations.
  • Virginia Giuffre — Epstein emails show he never disputed claims that Prince Andrew had sex with his accuser.
  • Jeffrey Epstein — New emails reveal he offered to arrange Prince Andrew meeting with Russian woman and received photos from trips.
  • Prince Andrew — Asked Epstein to help secure $200 million funding for US military vendor, revealing business entanglements.
  • Hillary Clinton — Speaks up as pressure intensifies for Prince Andrew to testify in ongoing Epstein case proceedings.
